step_feedback.feedback: Good job initiating the movement by squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Try to keep your elbows and wrists a bit more stable as you roll.
You're doing well with the shoulder roll. Focus on keeping your left elbow from drifting too far forward as you complete the circle.
Excellent! You completed the repetitions. Remember to inhale deeply as you pull your shoulders back to maximize the benefit.

exercise_summary: You're doing great with your shoulder rolls! Keep up the good work by gently squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Remember to breathe deeply as you move to help with lymphatic flow and breathing.
